title: Did Trump Fail To Denounce QAnon Conspiracy Theories?
subtitle: During a televised town hall ahead of Election Day, Trump tried to sidestep his past, tentative embrace of the conspiracy theorist movement.
author: Nur Ibrahim
vclaim: In an October 2020 town hall Q&A session, U.S. President Donald Trump failed to denounce QAnon, a fringe movement built on conspiracy theories positing a global pedophilic cabal and a “deep state” plot to undermine his presidency.
